title: Certaine philosophical preparations of foode and beverage for sea-men, in their long voyages: with some necessary, approoued, and hermeticall medicines and antidotes, fit to be had in readinesse at sea, for preuention or cure of diuers diseases.
author: Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?
notes: Reproduction of original in: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine. Library.
